name: Overpopulation, Or: Divided and Disillusioned We Wander in a World Gasping Under the Weight of Our Folly
name_original: Overpopulation, Or: Divided and Disillusioned We Wander in a World Gasping Under the Weight of Our Folly
description:
A partially successful experiment on writing something gamelike in Lisp.

This game is released under the GNU General Public License version 3. The source code is available at https://bitbucket.org/ltpour/overpopulation.
